summary: Two brothers love the same woman. Sometime after she marries one of them, he is killed and his brother is expected to marry her in order to make her child legitimate.
cast: Sunny Deol|Mahima Chaudhry|Apoorva Agnihotri|Dina Pathak|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Reema Lagoo|Dalip Tahil|Mohnish Bahl|Aasif Sheikh|Rakesh Bedi|Navneet Nishan|Ali Asgar|Annu Mathotra|Dolly Bindra|Nawae Sha|Neha Pendse|Qamar|Ritu Narvla|Ravi Gossain|Shah Hawaz|Sahil Vaid|Sukhwinder|Smita Kapauriksha|Mini Tabassum|Yogee Yooindra|Alok Nath|Veeru Krishnan|Shoma Anand|Shama Deshpande|Bindu|Nawab Shah
title: Pyaar Koi Khel Nahin
